item.title: Can Trump Stop TikTok Ban? Here’s What He Can—And Can’t—Do After Supreme Court Upholds Law
item.description: The president-elect is reportedly mulling executive orders that could pause the ban.

item.title: Foods That Support A Long Healthy Life

item.title: Yubico Issues Security Advisory As 2FA Bypass Vulnerability Confirmed
item.description: Yubico has confirmed a partial 2FA bypass issue could impact some YubiKey customers—here’s what you need to know.

item.title: TikTok Ban Upheld By Supreme Court—Should Start Sunday
item.description: Justices shot down concerns from the app and content creators that the law violates their First Amendment rights.
